CustomField.description: When selected, this Contact's address won't be synced with the Household Default or Seasonal Address. Use this to maintain a separate Mailing Address for this particular Contact. (Applies to Household Contacts only.)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When selected, this Contact's address won't be synced with the Household Default or Seasonal Address. Use this to maintain a separate Mailing Address for this particular Contact. (Applies to Household Contacts only.)
CustomField.label: Do Not Automatically Update
